definition: to write an IOU or promissory note
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: We shouldn't issue IOU to farmers.
sentences.chinese: 我们不应该给农民打白条。

sentences.english: Next year we should not issue IOUs to farmers again when we purchase farm produce and sideline products from them.
sentences.chinese: 明年我们不应再给农民打白条了。

definition: to buy or sell on credit/outstanding account/to have an outstanding account
to offer credit/credit transaction/to buy or sell on account
to repay a debt in kind or by labor
to pay in installments/payment in installments
to buy on credit/to delay payment
to defer payment/to pay back over long term
